item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

8. Mistral ships le chat – enterprise AI assistant that can run on prem (284 points | 86 comments)

26. OpenAI for Countries (121 points | 123 comments)
